creator: GameVui Dev
descriptionHtml:
Rummy 500 is the newest offline card game redesigned by GameVui Dev team. Rummy 500 is one of the most popular card games for 2 players, which is a classic card game with a fresh, modern appearance that makes you love playing it right away. With the guide of this card game, you can quickly learn how to play Rummy 500.

♠️ HOW TO PLAY RUMMY 500:
- Take turn to draw cards, make melds and discard a card to end your turn.
- The hand is over when a player play their last card. The melded cards score points, and any cards left in a player's hand count negative.
- The objective is to reach 500 points first!
- There are 5 modes: Regular, 3 Players, Team Play (2 vs 2), Persian Rummy, and Dealer's Gambit.

♠️ SCORING:
- Ace, Jokers: 15 points
- Face cards: 10 points
- Card 2 to 9: number value

♠️ HOT FEATURE:
- Free and offline.
- Small file size and low battery consumption.
- Suitable for all ages.
- No deposit or money is required.
- No registration is required.
- Many interesting modes to explore.
- Modern, eye-catching casino interface.
- Upbeat background music and sounds.

Rummy 500 is a basic yet enjoyable card game. With a carefully designed bots system that ranges from simple to hard, this game not only supports new players in learning the gameplay but also creates challenges for experienced players. This classic card game Rummy 500 is a great way to pass the time and relax after a long day of work or study.

You won't want to miss this Rummy 500 if you're seeking a quick, easy, and amusing offline card game. Download and play Rummy 500 now!
